alert.note: Alert for Lapeer (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 4:02PM EDT until July 11 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lapeer County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 401 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Columbiaville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lum around 420 PM EDT. Imlay City around 425 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Goodland Township, Burnside, Kings Mill and Attica. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
